ext.description: Real-time monitoring of Antigravity AI model usage credits, featuring a status bar summary, trend charts, smart model suggestions, and reset notifications.
config.title: AGQ
config.pinned: Model IDs to display in the status bar. If empty, defaults to 'AGQ'.
config.credits: Show prompt credits in the status bar.
config.threshold: Warning threshold (percentage). Triggers an alert when remaining quota falls below this value.
config.notify: Send desktop notifications when quota is below the threshold.
config.autoSwitch: Automatically suggest or find the best substitute model when quota is low.
config.resetNotify: Send a notification when a model's quota has been reset.
config.language: Dashboard and notification language. Select 'auto' to follow IDE language.
